Package com.ryanm.preflect

Generates a PreferenceActivity from an annotated object tree

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Persist Allows storage of configurations.
Preflect Handy utility for manipulating object trees that have been marked up with Variable annotations
PreflectActivity Remember to declare this activity in your AndroidManifest.xml
VariableType<T> Extend this to define new variable types.
 

Exception Summary
ParseException Use this to indicate failure when codec-ing in your VariableType
 

Error Summary
StructuralError Thrown to indicate something is wrong with the structure of your Variables
 

Package com.ryanm.preflect Description

Generates a PreferenceActivity from an annotated object tree
